Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near Exchange/74th
ShortDescription: Northbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates and 71st: due to street blockage near Exchange/74th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates, 71st and over regular route: due to street blockage near Exchange/74th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/Vermont
ShortDescription: Southbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th, Vermont and Lowe: due to street blockage near Halsted/Vermont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th, Vermont, Lowe and over regular route: due to street blockage near Halsted/Vermont.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Oakley
ShortDescription: Southbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Armitage, Damen & Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Oakley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Armitage, Damen, then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Oakley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Granville. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Granville.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
